title: Client Initiates KEM Handshake
description: The client begins the KEMTLS handshake by sending a key encapsulation request.

title: Server Performs Key Encapsulation
description: The server encapsulates a shared secret using the selected post-quantum KEM.

title: Shared Secret Established
description: Both client and server derive an identical shared secret without exchanging it directly.

title: Secure Channel Activated
description: A symmetric encrypted channel is established using the derived secret.
